reviews.review_msg: Very passionate and knowledgeable about the topic and engages in amazing discussions.I respect her a lot. Got a better mark on the final written assignment as I tried to use some of her optional readings in my writing fyi. Attendance and participation matters but she will never make you speak if you don't want to. Understanding and deeply caring.

Dr. Fung is amazing! Also had a first year course with her, mainly marked hard by TAs and why she has lower ratings. Extremely knowledgable on the topic and her lectures are engaging. She does not believe in exams and has lots of readings, essays and attendance marks, does not make you talk if you don't want to. Very approachable and understanding.

Carman is a great prof! She puts a lot of thought and effort into making the content approachable and interesting for both beginners and veterans to gender studies. Very helpful in discussing ideas outside of class time. Relaxed class vibe, encourages participation but doesn't force individual people to talk.
